text: Table 3 Common complications after LT Early 1. Bleeding 2. Primary allograft dysfunction 3. Primary allograft non-function 4. Thrombosis of portal vein 5. IVC and hepatic vein thrombosis 6. Biliary tree obstruction 7. Hepatic artery thrombosis 8. Acute kidney injury 9. Sepsis 10. Cardiovascular events Late 1. Immunosuppressant-related side-effects 2. Infection 3. Graft rejection 4. Recurrent primary disease 5. Biliary tree obstruction
